rv - Edit summaries are not subject to NPOV

/* Mechanism of action of homeopathic preparations */ Mechanism either placebo effect or water memory, both covered, so title can be simpler
Hahnemann was the first to conceive of microbes, many years before Pasteur & Koch; this is fact not a claim; check the history books

/* Lack of known mechanism */ Davenas Nature paper cited as positive result used vortexing to dilute, this is a standard lab method used routinely to prepare dilutions.

/* Scientific testing of homeopathic treatment */ removed highly, will replace if p values <0.005, since this is usual level for "highly significant"

/* Lack of known mechanism */ reword as compromise. Still POV and undue weight. Should be removed eventually.
they are not claims they are published studies covering at least 70 years;this article is about homeopathy NOT the scientific view of it
/* Lack of known mechanism */ Remove claims from unreliable sources. Please see Wikipedia guidelines on reliable sources. Exceptional claims require exceptional sources.
rv. a truly neutral view: any interested reader should know these studies exist; plus additions
rv. making special note of these studies stains NPOV#Undue_weight. Exceptional claims require exceptional sources.

in vitro potentization studies are valid data for readers to evaluate as they wish
